name: Naganohara Meteor Swarm
description:
Combat Action: When your active character is Yoimiya, equip this card.
After Yoimiya equips this card, immediately use Niwabi Fire-Dance once.
The Niwabi Enshou generated by your Yoimiya, who has this card equipped, gains +1 intitial Usage(s).
(You must have Yoimiya in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
descriptionraw:
$[K1]: When your active character is <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[A1305]</color>, equip this card.
After $[A1305] equips this card, immediately use <color=#FFD780FF>$[S13052]</color> once.
The <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C113051]</color> generated by your $[A1305], who has this card equipped, gains +1 intitial $[K3].
(You must have $[A1305] in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
descriptionreplaced:
<color=#FFFFFFFF>Combat Action</color>: When your active character is <color=#FFFFFFFF>Yoimiya</color>, equip this card.
After Yoimiya equips this card, immediately use <color=#FFD780FF>Niwabi Fire-Dance</color> once.
The <color=#FFFFFFFF>Niwabi Enshou</color> generated by your Yoimiya, who has this card equipped, gains +1 intitial <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage(s)</color>.
(You must have Yoimiya in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
source: Reward for inviting Yoimiya to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives
